theory.introduction: Python supports all basic math operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, and more.
theory.explanation: You can use symbols like `+`, `-`, `*`, `/`, `**` (power), and `%` (modulus) to perform math. You can use these in expressions and assign the result to variables.
